title: Achievement?

replies.body: several other people have done the same thing you have and gotten banned. i personally wouldn't do this nor consider it an achievement.

replies.body: This is considered forum spam, however, your posts are relevant to the topic so it's not 100% pure spam.

replies.body: If achievement for you is spam, so yea, awesome achievement..
